.. java:import:: android.view ViewGroup

RendererInterface
=================

.. java:package:: com.eddmash.validation.renderer
   :noindex:

.. java:type::  interface RendererInterface

   Class that implement this interface make it easy to render validation errors \ :java:ref:`ErrorRenderer`\

Methods
-------
render
^^^^^^

.. java:method::  void render(ViewGroup errorSpace)
   :outertype: RendererInterface
